comment.language: From the Paramoun of the Nativity to the Feast of the Circumcision:
Dari Paramoun Natal sampai Perayaan Sunat:

text.language: Eyrenhwc e~rok: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma e#y#u#: je aumack akcw] m~mon nai nan.
That we may praise You: with Your good Father: and the Holy Spirit: for You were born and saved us. Have mercy on us.

language.div: Biar kami memujiMu, bersama BapaMu yang baik, dan Roh Kudus, karna Kau tlah lahir dan slamatkan kami, kasihanilah kami.

text.language: لكي نسبحَكَ، مع ابيكَ الصالح، والروح القدس، لأنك ولدت وخلصتنا أرحمنا.

comment.language: From Paramoun of the Theophany until the 12th of Tobe:
Dari Paramoun Teofani sampai hari ke-12 dari bulan Tubah:

text.language: Eyrenhwc e~rok: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma e#y#u#: je ak[iwmc akcw] m~mon nai nan.
That we may praise You: with Your good Father: and the Holy Spirit: for You were baptized and saved us. Have mercy on us.

language.div: Biar kami memujiMu, bersama BapaMu yang baik, dan Roh Kudus, karna Kau tlah dibaptis dan slamatkan kami, kasihanilah kami.

text.language: لكي نسبحَكَ، مع ابيكَ الصالح، والروح القدس، لأنك أعتمدت وخلصتنا أرحمنا.

comment.language: On the two Feasts of the Cross, during Holy Pascha Week, and during funerals:
Pada Dua Perayaan Salib, masa Pekan Paskah Suci dan Doa Pemakaman:

text.language: Eyrenhwc e~rok: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma e#y#u#: je auask akcw] m~mon nai nan.
That we may praise You: with Your good Father: and the Holy Spirit: for You were crucified and saved us. Have mercy on us.

language.div: Biar kami memujiMu, bersama BapaMu yang baik, dan Roh Kudus, karna Kau tlah disalibkan dan slamatkan kami, kasihanilah kami.

text.language: لكي نسبحَكَ، مع ابيكَ الصالح، والروح القدس، لأنك صلبت وخلصتنا أرحمنا.
Eyrenhwc e~rok: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma e#y#u#: je aktwnk akcw] m~mon nai nan.
That we may praise You: with Your good Father: and the Holy Spirit: for You have risen and saved us. Have mercy on us.

language.div: Biar kami memujiMu, bersama BapaMu yang baik, dan Roh Kudus, karna Kau tlah bangkit dan slamatkan kami, kasihanilah kami.

text.language: لكي نسبحَكَ، مع ابيكَ الصالح، والروح القدس، لأنك قمت وخلصتنا أرحمنا.

comment.language: On standard days of the year and on fasting days:
Pada hari-hari standar dan hari-hari puasa

text.language: Eyrenhwc e~rok: nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc: nem Pip~neuma e#y#u#: je aki~ akcw] m~mon nai nan.
That we may praise You: with Your good Father: and the Holy Spirit: for You have come and saved us. Have mercy on us.

language.div: Biar kami memujiMu, bersama BapaMu yang baik, dan Roh Kudus, karna Kau tlah datang dan slamatkan kami, kasihanilah kami.

text.language: لكى نسبحك مع أبيك الصالح والروح القدس لأنك أتيت وخلصتنا أرحمنا.
